    Service that handles comments and replies associated with articles.

    Service class that deals with the hierarchy of taxonomic terms as they relate to the articles in a given journal.
    ConfigurationReadService 
    IngestibleService
    Service that deals with article .zip archives in the ingest source directory (defined by the ambra.services.documentManagement.ingestSourceDir property of ambra.xml).
